attributes.action: to completly ban alcohol in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that if alcohol is completly banned in the uk that the crime rate will descend rapidly and will be less of a drain on tax payers money for alcohollics to sit on state benfits and drink alcohol and the drunks on the streets who are offensive and abusive and this will be a problem of the past.
